extendedInfo.description: Get your favorite hockey teams and players salaries directly on your phone.  Check out how Shea Weber's contract is broken down into salary and cap hits.  Check out how much Sidney Crosby makes or Shane Doan. This app is great for all NHL Players, NHL Teams, and even AHL players and teams.Check it outKeywords - Cap Geek, Cap Geak, NHL Numbers, NHL Salaries, NHL Cap hits, New Jersey Devils Salaries, Salaries, New York Islanders Salaries, New York Rangers Salaries, Philadelphia Flyers Salaries, Pittsburgh Penguins Salaries, Boston Bruins Salaries, Buffalo Sabres Salaries, 	Montreal Canadiens Salaries, Ottawa Senators Salaries, Toronto Maple Leafs Salaries, Carolina Hurricanes Salaries, Florida Panthers Salaries, Tampa Bay Lightning Salaries, Washington Capitals	Winnipeg Jets Salaries, Chicago Blackhawks Salaries, Columbus Blue Jackets Salaries, Detroit Red Wings Salaries, Nashville Predators Salaries, St. Louis Blues Salaries, Calgary Flames Salaries, Colorado Avalanche Salaries, Edmonton Oilers Salaries, Minnesota Wild Salaries, Vancouver Canucks Salaries, Anaheim Ducks Salaries, Dallas Stars Salaries, Los Angeles Kings Salaries, Phoenix Coyotes Salaries, San Jose Sharks Salaries

reviews.title: Just ok
reviews.comment: The full website is much better

reviews.title: S3

reviews.title: Kills battery
reviews.comment: This app doesnt close itself and uses a ton of battery! Used 20% of it today
